message.content:
{"id": "7581", "title": "Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet", "description": "From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in messagenews:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...

<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '7581', 'title': 'Bug 7581ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in propery sheet', 'description': 'From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in messagenews:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com... ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'I would have expected behavior where the combo box is always the width of the property sheet column.Note that it should work the same DialogCellEditor (Button always visible)Will need to investigate to determine if this is us or SWT. ', 'SR': ''}

</BUG REPORT>",
"OB": "The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet does not adjust its width to match the width of the column.",
"EB": "I would expect the ComboBoxCellEditor to always match the width of the property sheet column. Currently, it does not adjust its width.",
"SR": "Investigate the issue to determine whether this is a problem with our application or with SWT framework. Also, ensure that the ComboBoxCellEditor works the same way as the DialogCellEditor, where the button is always visible."}
